Name: Tetradrachm of Ptolemy X
Description: Tetradrachm of Ptolemy X minted in Paphos (Cyprus). Anverse: head of king (Ptolemy I?) with diadem and aegis, on the right. Reverse: eagle above thunderbolt, on the left; in the field, on the left, LB and underneath a star; on the left, PA. Mintage's position 12.00 hours.
